name: Astrobullet
description:
Astrobullet is a game about astronaut in captured cargo ship

Programmer: saldush

Pixel artist: ltryer

Sound design, music: https://freesound.org, www.zapsplat.com/  Special thanks for sounds/music to: mrThomas2000, aceinet, Divoljud, dersuperanton Control:

Left click: to shoot and move

Right click: to gravity

A/D: to rotate
